goalSetting.title: Seta Inhloso Yakho Yekucala
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Luhambo ngalunye ludzinga indzawo yekugcina. Yiyiphi inhloso yakho yekucala yemali?
goalSetting.instruction: Khetsa inye ukuze ucalise. Ungayishintja kamuva.

goalSet.title: Inhloso Isetjwe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Kuhle! Usetile inhloso yakho ku-{{amount}} ye-{{goalTitle}}. Ake sicale kufundza nge-inthanethi ehlanganisiwe!

simulate.title: Fanenkisa
simulate.subtitle: Bona kutsi imali yakho lengayitsatsa ingakhula/incipha kanjani ngesikhatsi
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Bungoti lobukhulu, imbuyiso lenemandla lengaba khona
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Inkhokhelo incane kakhulu kukhokha sikweletu noma sikhatsi siphelile nesamba lesisele:
simulate.add200Desc: Khokha R200 ngekweqile ngenyanga ukuze unciphise imvuzo netinyanga.
simulate.add500Desc: Khokha R500 ngekweqile ngenyanga ukuze ukhokhe ngekushesha.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Yindzele inkhokhelo yakho ukuze ifinyelele ku-R100 lelandzelako.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Yenta inani lelifana nenkhokhelo eyodwa ngekweqile ngenyanga ngemnyaka.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Imali yakho lengayitsatsa ingakhula idlule kabili kuneminikelo yakho ngekukhula lokuhlanganisiwe!
simulate.timeInsight: Ngekuba neminyaka lengu-{{years}}, unika imvuzo lehlanganisiwe sikhatsi lesanele kusebenta.
simulate.contributionInsight: Umsebenti lomuhle! Kunikela nge-R{{amount}} ngenyanga kukubeka endleleni leqinile yekufinyelela emagoli akho.
simulate.debtInsight: Kwandzisa inkhokhelo yakho ngisho nangenani lelincane kunganciphisa kakhulu tinyanga tekukhokha futsi kunciphise inani lemvuzo leliphelele.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Kugcina: imvuzo yemnyaka ivame kukhuphuka njengobe ibhalansi ikhula (ihlanganisiwe).
simulate.debtTableHint: Sikweletu: imvuzo yemnyaka ivame kuncipha njengobe inani lelisisekelo likhokhwa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Lokhu kungukulinganisa lokulula ngenhloso yekufundzisa. Imbuyiso yangempela ingahluka kakhulu ngenca yekushintjashintja kwemakethe, imali lekhokhwayo nalokunye. Kusebenta kwangaphambilini akugcini isiqiniseko semiphumela yesikhatsi lesizayo.
simulate.chartError: Ingxenye yeshadi yehlulekile kubonisa. Lokhu kwenteka kaningi uma imodyuli yendabuko ye-react-native-svg ingaxhunyiwe/ingafakwanga ekwakheni kwedivayisi. Usengasebenzisa i-simulator ngaphandle kweshadi.
simulate.chartFixTips: Thiphu tekulungisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, bese uhlanza & uphinde wakhe. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, bese uphinde wakhe.
simulate.scenarioProjection: Leli linganiso le-{{scenarioName}} libonisa imbuyiso yemnyaka ye-{{returnRate}}% lehlanganisiwe ngenyanga. Ngekufaka kwakho kwamanje ngaphezu kweminyaka le-{{years}} {{yearUnit}}, inani lakho lelilinganiselwe lingaba ngu-{{total}} okungu-{{growth}} kukhula lokuhlanganisiwe.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Lokushoko: Indlela ye-{{scenarioName}} ivame kuhlosela cishe ku-{{returnRate}}% ngemnyaka ngekulinganisa esikhatsini leside, ngemvume yekushintjashintja kwe-{{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Imbuyiso yangempela iyahluka; lokhu akuyona isiqiniseko. Yisebenzise ukuze uzwe kutsi izinga nesikhatsi kushintja kanjani imiphumela.

compounding.title: Bumlingo Bekukhula Kwemali
compounding.description: Fundza kutsi imali yakho ingakhula kanjani ngesikhatsi ngamandla enhlahlo lephindaphindiwe.

concept.title: Lwemcondvo
concept.content: Cabanga kutsi unesihlahla semali. Inhlahlo lephindaphindiwe ifana nekutjala timbewu letiwela esihlahleni sakho, kutsi tikhule tibe tihlahla temali letintjha.

coreIdea.title: Lwemcondvo Lomkhulu
coreIdea.content: Utfola inhlahlo emalini yakho. Bese utfola *inhlahlo enhlahloeni yakho*. Loyo ngumlingo.

interactive.title: Kubona Ekusebenteni
interactive.content: Ake sikubone ekusebenteni. Hudza loku-slide kutsi ubone kutsi imali letfutshelwe ye-R10,000 ikhula kanjani ku-8% inhlahlo.

emergencyFund.title: Imali Yetingoti Ichazulwe
emergencyFund.description: Kutsi kungani udinga imali yetingoti nekutsi kumalini lokumele uwulondvoloze ngaphambi kwekutfutsa.

why.title: Kungani Uzikhatsatse?
why.content: Kuphila kuyenteka‚Äîkulahleka kwemsebenzi, kulungiswa kwetimoto, tikweleti tekwelapha. Imali yetingoti ikuvimbela kutsi ungene etikweletini (noma uthengise timali letifutshelwe ngesikhathi lesibucayi).

howMuch.title: Kumalini?
howMuch.content: Umtsetfo lojwayelekile: tinyanga leti-3‚Äì6 teletindleko letibucayi. Cala ngenhloso lencane (R5,000‚ÄìR10,000), bese wakha.

interactive.title: Inhloso Yakho
interactive.content: Hudza kubeka tintfo letibucayi tenyanga (irente, kudla, kuphasasa). Sitakukombisa inhloso yetingoti tenyanga leti-3‚Äì6.

firstPortfolio.title: Kwakha Iphothifoliyo Yakho Yekucala
firstPortfolio.description: Kha iphothifoliyo yetimali letifutshelwe lehlukahlukene levumelana nentfulo zakho nekwemukela ingoti.

goals.title: Cala Ngentfulo
goals.content: Sikhathi + inhloso = kusaba. Tintfulo tesikhathi lesifushane ‚Üí tintfo letiphephile. Tintfulo tesikhathi leliside ‚Üí tintfo tekukhula lokwengeta.

diversify.title: Kwehlukanisa
diversify.content: Hlanganisa tinhlobo tetintfo (tisheya, tibondi, imali) netindvawo kutsi loya munye longaphumeleli angacwilisi umkhumbi wonkhe.

interactive.title: Zama Kusaba
interactive.content: Nyakaza ema-slider etisheya/tibondi/imali. Bona kucinca lokufanekisiwe nembuyiselo yesikhathi leliside kucintja ngesikhathi sangempela.

riskReturn.title: Kucondza Libungoti Nekubuya
riskReturn.description: Tfola kubambana kwelibungoti nekutsi kungabuya njengelinisela ekutsaleni mali.

intro.title: Libungoti Yini?
intro.content: Libungoti kutsi kutsi kutsale mali kwakho kungakhula kangakanani noma kuwe. Libungoti leliphakeme lingasho inzuzo lephakeme ‚Äî kodvwa futsi nefali lelikhulu.

tradeoff.title: Kushintshana
tradeoff.content: Tintfo letiphephile (njengecash) tinengeniso lephansi. Tintfo letinebungoti (njengama-stock) tingakhula kakhulu ngekuhamba kwesikhati kodvwa tinyakanyaka kakhulu.

interactive.title: Khetsa Indlela Yakho
interactive.content: Nyakanyisa isilaydara phakathi kwe"kuphephile" ne"bungoti" kubona kutsi kushintsha negeniso yesikhati leside kungashintja kanjani.

options.A: Inzuzo lephakeme ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi lisho libungoti lelincane
options.B: Inzuzo lephakeme lelingaba khona ngalelinye likhatsi liza ngebungoti lebukulu

taxEfficient.title: Kubhadalela Ngendlela Lesebenta Ngemithelo
taxEfficient.description: Fundza ngema-akhawunti langenamithelo / lanenkonzo yemithelo nekubeka ngekuhlakaniphe kugcina lokuningi lekufika kwakho.

wrappers.title: Sebentisa Sigubho
wrappers.content: Ema-akhawunti lanenkonzo yemithelo njenge-RA, avikela lokukhula/tizabelo emithelweni lethile.

placement.title: Indvwo Yetimpahla
placement.content: Beka tintfo letingasebenti kahle ngemithelo (njengema-bond funds, labakhokheli betizabelo letikulu) ema-akhawuntini lachunyiwe emithelweni kuqala.

interactive.title: Kubeka Ngekuhlakaniphe
interactive.content: Hudza ema-funds ku-"Lanemithelo" vs "Lanenkonzo Yemithelo" timbakede. Bona indlela lesilinganiso sangemumva kwemithelo siphucuka ngayo.

quiz.title: Kuhlola Ngekushesha
quiz.question: Yiliphi lihambelo lelitjatsiswa LISEBENTA KAKHULU ngemithelo?

options.A: Kubamba ema-bond funds ku-akhawunti lonenkonzo yemithelo
options.B: Kubamba ema-bond funds ku-akhawunti ye-brokerage lenemithelo

reward.notEligibleMessage: Cedza konkhe lokufanele ufeze kute utsatse umvuzo wakho!

takeYourTime.title: Ungajahi
takeYourTime.description: Ungajahi ngetifundvo. Titsatsele sikhatsi kute ucondzisise umcondvo ngamunye.

practiceMakesPerfect.title: Kutilolonga Kwenta Uphelele
practiceMakesPerfect.description: Buyela etifundvweni uphindze uzame tincenye letisebentisanako tikhatsi letinyenti.

learnDaily.title: Fundza Malanga Onkhe
learnDaily.description: Sebentisa imizuzu nje le-5-10 onkhe malanga kute wakhe lwazi lwakho lwetetimali.
